page.title: 11INDUSTRY IN SOUTHPORT
page.content: In our area there is little heavy industry apart from three metal works,three power works and one chemical works.Most of Southport's trade is concerned with the leisure industry,light manufacturing and light engineering. Perhaps our best known food manufacture is"Famous Names Ltd"which is situated at Virginia St.They manufacture a range of sugar confectionery including Chewits,Goodies and the Parkinson Range.The site employs about two hundred and fifty personnel.The company originated as the Arthur Holland Company founded in 1885 and has occupied the present site since the 1920's. There are twenty one garages in our area,the largest being Holland Motors employing 80 people.
